Player History
Drafted in 9th round, 138th overall pick, by Detroit in 2018...
Injured on 7/27/2019 with a Pulled Achilles Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
Had first career hit on 9/2/2019, off Jason Billie (COL)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/6/2019, off Houston Slane (STL)...
Injured on 4/17/2020 with a Bruised Finger, out for 4 days...
Traded from Detroit to Houston on 5/16/2020 (Going to HOU: LF Freeman Williams. Going to DET: P Alfonso Yaquet)...
Traded from Houston to Atlanta on 4/11/2022 (Going to HOU: 3B Mike Dickerson, SS Ernest Lee. Going to ATL: RF Filiberto Tomas, LF Freeman Williams)...
1/31/2024: Gets a new one-year contract worth $685,714 through salary arbitration...
